metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000190 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: SimpleXML (latest version 2.7.1) is vulnerable to an XXE vulnerability resulting SSRF, information disclosure, DoS and so on.

notes.Note: msalvatore> As of 11/09/2018, there is a comment on github recommending updating to "2.7.3". This may be the fix version.

criterions.comment: simple-xml package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-3').
